project.name: lib-rs-filter
project.description:
RESTful web service client and filter implementations.
This library provides REST utilities including - an abstract rest client - filter interfaces that may be applied to any JAX-RS (Jersey) REST service.
Filters are applied by annotation. Includes reference implementations of the following RESTful protocols and strategies:
MessageAddressing - REST implementation of SOAP Web Services Addressing 1.0 (WS-Addressing) protocol
History
v0.1.0 - import basic container filters from ssp-develop v0.2.0 - refactor all into 'ch.keybridge.rs' base package v0.3.0 - add abstract rest client and client filters v0.4.0 - add cache control and other dynamic filters v0.5.0 - allow manual ETag configuration v0.6.0 - bug fix for etag against null responses v0.7.0 - add http authorization header blueprint; implementation is application specific v0.8.0 - add token security context, filters, etc. v0.9.0 - add JSON Web Token principal and security context support v0.10.0 - move token principal and security context to openid-jaspic library v0.11.0 - fix EtagFilter to assign eTag based on request URI instead of response content; fixed NPE and instability issues v0.12.0 - rewrite abstract rest client to require a base URI in constructor
